title: ‘The Tour and I Have a Bad Relationship:’ Heartbreak for Matteo Jorgenson as the American Falls Just Short on Tour de France Stage 19
content:
Jorgenson was given the go ahead to contest the stage win after team leader Vingegaard didn’t have the legs to attack Pogačar.

Read the full article at ‘The Tour and I Have a Bad Relationship:’ Heartbreak for Matteo Jorgenson as the American Falls Just Short on Tour de France Stage 19 on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
